title: Ticket #1427: Quill's reindex stored procedure doesn't some tables
description: Quill's reindex stored procedure misses at least jobs_vertical_history, perhaps others. Without this, quill users can see enormous index bloat. One user reported an index on this table 10x bigger than the table itself.
check_ins: 2010-Jun-04 11:16   Check-in [18313]: Add jobs_vertical_history to list of tables reindexed by quill #1427 (By Greg Thain )
creator: gthain
